title: Ridiculous 9K Ping Lag Spikes HELPPPP

replies.body: That is really intense, damn!  Your score with your ISP might be good, but you might be having more local issues causing this.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for a closer overview.  Depending on your score, you may want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network a bit.
sadly, ive tried EVERYTHING and it is still happening every single game. 6 days so far :(
